title: AI now a key feature of everyday life in Thailand
description: Some 91% of Thai internet users now use artificial intelligence (AI) in their daily lives, up from 77% in 2024, reflecting how AI has become an "invisible" part of everyday life.

title: USI Launches EMVCo-Certified Intelligent Tablet POS, Integrating Sales and Payment Solutions
description: SHANGHAI, Aug. 19, 2025 /PRNewswire/ --  With the rapid advancement of technology, the retail market is undergoing unprecedented transformation. Consumers are demanding more convenient, efficient, and secure shopping experiences, prompting retailers to seek innovative solutions that enhance both service quality and operational efficiency. According to a market research firm GII Global Information report, the global smart retail market is projected to grow from $35.89 billion in 2023 to $352.53 billion by 2032, with a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 28.9%. This surge is driven by the increasing adoption of artificial intelligence (AI), the widespread use of digital payment methods, and a growing preference for seamless, personalized shopping experiences.
content: SHANGHAI, Aug. 19, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- With the rapid advancement of technology, the retail market is undergoing unprecedented transformation. Consumers are demanding more convenient, efficient, and secure shopping experiences, prompting retailers t... [4679 chars]

title: How AI data centers lead to big electric bills in NY and NJ
description: Households are now competing against power-hungry computer data centers from the likes of Amazon, Google, Meta and Microsoft put strain on the grid to power new artificial intelligence projects. Add in the fact that New York and New Jersey have both shut down nuclear power and pursued expensive green mandates, and customers are seeing a big strain on their wallets.
content:
Summer always increases electricity bills, as more people use electricity for air conditioning. But there’s another issue popping up this year: Not AC, but AI.
